org.apache.axis.utils.cache

Class JavaClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.axis.utils.cache.JavaClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class JavaClass
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A simple cache of previously loaded classes, and their methods.
    Author:
    Sam Ruby
